Tip

the wheels of the train go round and round,clickety clack clickefy clack,the wheels of the train go round and round,clickety clack clickefy clack,the engineer toots his horn,tools his horn toots his horn,the engineer toots his horn,toots his horn,the crossing gates come right down,come right down come right down,the crossing gates come right down,come right down,the people on the train get bumped around,bumped around bumped around,the people on the train get bumped around,bumped around

通过class调用
```` class="tip-top" class="tip-top-right" class="tip-top-left" class="tip-bottom" class="tip-bottom-right" class="tip-bottom-left" class="tip-right" class="tip-right" class="tip-xxx tip-always" ````

Dropmenu 实例：

  • 个人中心
  • 设置
  • 信息 5
  • 登出

George Clooney Look, just because I don't be givin' no man a foot massage don't make it right for Marsellus to throw

George Clooney Look, just because I don't be givin' no man a foot massage don't make it right for Marsellus to throw
HTML
```` <div class="dropmenu" data-toggle="dropmenu"> <*> ... </*> <div> ... </div> </div> ````
通过 data 属性
```` <div class="dropmenu" data-toggle="dropmenu" data-direction="top" data-trigger="mouseenter"></div> data-direction="left" data-direction="right" data-direction="top" data-direction="topleft" data-direction="topright" data-trigger="mouseenter" ````

Datepicker 实例：

CN:
MIN today:
Times:
Year:
Min Month:
Max Month:
Min+1
Max-1
Max+15:
最小明天:
最大昨天:
选择1:
选择2:
HTML
```` <div data-toggle="datepicker"> <input type="text" name=""> </div> ````
通过 data 属性
```` <div data-toggle="datepicker" data-format="yyyy/MM/dd" ... > <input type="text" name=""> </div> ````
通过 JavaScript 调用
```` $el.datepicker({ format: 'yyyy/MM/dd' //yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy.MM.dd min: new Date() //2016-01-01 max: new Date() //2016-01-01 }); ````

Select 实例：

开启自定义select
HTML
```` <select data-toggle="select"> <option value="1">选项1</option> <option value="2">选项2</option> <option value="3">选项3</option> </select> ````
通过 data 设置默认选中值
```` // 开启自定义select 并设置选中值 <select data-select="2"> <option> ... </option> <option> ... </option> </select> ````
通过 JavaScript 调用
```` $el.select({'select': '2'}); // 更新select $el.select('update'); ````

HTML
```` <div class="tabs" data-toggle="tab"> <div class="tab-list"> <button type="button" class="btn">xxxx</button> </div> <div class="tab-context"> <div> ... </div> <div data-url=""> ... </div> </div> </div> ````

Msgbox 实例：

通过 JavaScript 调用
```` $.fn.msgbox({ html: 'html Text', text: 'text Text', w: 200, h: 200, title: 'title Text', num: 2, bind: function(btn, target, next){}, success: function(next){}, error: function(){}, textY: '确定', textN: '取消', close: 'true' }); // 隐藏msgbox $.fn.msgbox('hide') // 隐藏所有 $.fn.msgbox('last') // 隐藏最后一个 ````

Toast 实例：

通过 JavaScript 调用
```` $.fn.toast({ text: '这是一条提示消息', type: 'success', auto: false }) ````

Imgbox 实例：

通过class调用

```` class="imgbox" ````

Imgup 实例：

单个，限制大小
HTML
```` <div data-toggle="imgup"> <input type="hidden" data-type="imgup" value=""> </div> ````
通过 data 限制大小(需带单位KB,MB,GB)
```` <div data-toggle="imgup" data-size="2MB"> <input type="hidden" data-type="imgup" value=""> </div> ````
通过 JavaScript 调用
```` $('.imgupx').imgup({ max: 5, size: '4MB' }); ````

Validate 实例：

不正确
不正确
不正确

自定义

值必须等于123
必选一个
必选一个
不正确
不正确 

        

    

    



通过 JavaScript 调用


````
ajax: false             // 是否使用ajax提交,必须有success方法,返回ajax的data数据
target: null            // 验证区域，默认form
enter: false         // 是否回车提交
before: function () { // 自定义验证
    return 0;
}
success: function () {// 正确回调
    form.submit()
}
error: function () {} // 错误回调
$.fn.validate({'check': '#cksms,#cksms1,#cksms2'}); // 检查一组或一个
````


验证类型


````
data-api type | data-type
"text"     // 文本验证
"password" // 密码验证
"email"    // 邮箱验证
"number"   // 数字验证 最小0.01
"tel"      // 电话验证 区号（-）号码
"mobile"   // 手机验证
"mtel"     // 电话和手机验证
"select"   // select验证
"imgup"    // 图片上传验证
"checkbox" // checkbox验证
````


长度验证


````
data-length="[1,15]"
number独有
data-size="[0.01, 15]"
data-point="3" // 允许多少位小数点，默认2位

// 没有最大值使用0
data-length="[5,0]"
````

Page 实例：




通过 JavaScript 调用


````
$(el).page({
    total: 10,    //总页数
    page: 1,      //指定当前页
    param: 'page' //url参数
})
````




                    

    
Slider 实例：

    

        

            
            
            
        

    


HTML


````
<div class="slider" data-toggle="slider">
    <div>
        <a href="#" style="background-image: url('../img/1.jpg')"></a>
        <a href="#" style="background-image: url('../img/2.jpg')"></a>
        <a href="#" style="background-image: url('../img/3.jpg')"></a>
    </div>
</div>
````


通过 data 属性


````
<div data-auto="true" data-arrow="true" ... > ... </div>
````


通过 JavaScript 调用


````
$el.slider({
    auto: true,
    arrow: true,
    stop: 5000,
    speed: 600,
    ease: 'ease'
});
````

        新照片

HTML


````
<div class="accordion" data-toggle="accordion">
    <a href="javascript:;" class="btn adn-more"> ... </a>
    <div>
        <a href="javascript:;" class="btn"> ... </a>
    </div>
</div>
````


通过 JavaScript 调用


````
$el.accordion();
````




                    


Grade 实例：



    

        
        
        
        
        
        
    





    

        
        
        
        
        
        
    




HTML


````
<div class="grade">
    <input type="hidden"/>
    <span data-grade="1"></span>
    <span data-grade="2"></span>
    <span data-grade="3"></span>
    <span data-grade="4"></span>
    <span data-grade="5"></span>
</div>
````




                    


Tags 实例：



    
    
    
    
    
        
        
    



HTML


````
<div class="tags" data-name="tags[]">
    <span class="tag-add">
        <input type="text">
        <button type="button" class="btn">添加</button>
    </span>
</div>
````


通过 data 赋予name


````
<div class="tags" data-name="tags[]"></div>
````




                    


Checkbox & Radio



    
    
    
    
    

    
    
    
    



HTML


````
<label class="checkbox | radio">
    <input type="checkbox | radio" value="" name="name">
    <span class="ck-indicator"></span>
    <span class="ck-description">Pasta</span>
</label>
````




                    


Toggle









HTML


````
<label class="toggle">
    <input type="checkbox">
    <span class="toggle-indicator"></span>
    <span class="toggle-description">启用钩子</span>
</label>
````

Responsive-image 实例：
